review: When the Chromecast works, it is great.  However, it has to be re-setup every time there is an interruption I  the power or the internet.  Further, the setup is straightforward if the device responds as it should.  Notice the word "if" as this is rarely the case.  Most often, 45 minutes is spent cycling through the same process until it finally cooperates.

review: It's $35 to do what your blue ray player already does.  Total waste of time. Pandora will connect but no sound. No real support with chromecast for these problems except their website of painfully obvious answers that don't work. The google music app doesn't work well either so I can't enjoy music through it at all. I kept telling myself it must be me but after reading some of the other reviews and fooling with it for a week, I'm finished!I'm boxing mine up and returning it. I'd rather literally flush $35 downtown he toilet than to give this product revenue after all the hype.
author: Keith

review: This is a really useful product that allows you to very simply plug into the back of your TV, and stream HD video, movies etc... from your computer, laptop, tablet or phone. right to your HDMI TV. It comes with everything you need to get started. The only thing you will need to do prior to getting started is to download the Chromecast app on the device you wish to stream from; then just plug in the Chromecast and your ready to go!Remember: download the app first!
